alert.note: Alert for Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 12:48PM EST until December 24 at 6:49AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Maine... Swift River At Roxbury affecting Oxford County. For the Swift River...including Roxbury...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Swift River at Roxbury. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Flood waters inundate Route 17 in Byron near the intersection of Byron Village Road. At 10.0 feet, Closure of Route 17 likely from flood waters, significantly impacting travel in and out of the area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM EST Friday the stage was 2.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 10.1 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
